WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please see Prism 4.0 CTP - August 2010 at http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/49963
WorkItem.Description:
In "Composite Application Guidance for WPF and Silverlight - May 2010", "Separated Presentation" section there's text
 
 it also changes in the model into user interface actions
 
I would suggest it changed to
 
 it also translates changes in the model into user interface actions
 
The particular verb section is up to the author but the sentence would definitely benefit from having one.

Comments.Message:
Thanks for the feedback. 
We have modified the sentence to be:
>> The presenter coordinates the interaction between the view and the model by translating user gestures into changes in the model.
You will see this change in the next release.
